sections.title: Overview
sections.content: This application manages characters and loadouts. Use the navigation buttons to explore.

sections.title: Alignment System
sections.content: Characters have an alignment value between -100 and 100. The profile page shows this on a colored bar.

sections.title: Random Loadouts
sections.content: The random button jumps to a random character and loadout for quick inspiration.

sections.title: World Builder
sections.content: Design and connect tiles to create custom worlds. Use edit mode to modify tiles and export or import your creations.

sections.title: Adventure Mode
sections.content: Embark on adventures using your characters, navigate the world, and interact with events generated from your world data.
